```{r}
library(kableExtra)
library(htmltools)

source("R/06_maketables_persistentpoverty.R")
source("R/06_makecharts_persistentpoverty.R")

interactive <- function(chart, height = 3) {
  ggiraph(ggobj = chart, width = 1, height_svg = height, width_svg = 7)
}

devnote <- function(md) {
  div(class = "devnote-text",
      div(class = "devnote-text__text",
          create_html(md)))  
}

create_html <- function(md) {
  htmltools::HTML(
    markdown::markdownToHTML(
      text = md, fragment.only = TRUE
    )
  )
}
```
